Detailed Description

(standard deviation)^2 template

This class implements an objective function that is the standard deviation of the quality metric evalutations.

MESQUITE_EXPORT Mesquite::VarianceTemplate::VarianceTemplate ( const VarianceTemplate &  copy  ) 

copy constructor

Define a copy constructor because the compiler-provided default one would also copy the temporary arrays, which would be a waste of time.
